divs: sighting detailsdriving to work at 4:45 am est and noticed a brilliant light in the eastern morning sky. it was barely above the treeline \ horizon, and i lost it going east. (the moon and other celesial bodies move east to west) this object moved in opposition to this. i have no idea what this was, is or could be? (ultra-secret) technology??? who knows?
Object Shape: Boomerang, Fireball, Flash, Star-like, Triangle, Other

Summary: A brilliant light that looked like 3 lights bouncing off each other (expand and contract).
